benchmark_details.name: JaccDiv: A Metric and Benchmark for Quantifying Diversity of Generated Marketing Text in the Music Industry
benchmark_details.overview: This research introduces JaccDiv, a metric to evaluate the diversity of generated marketing texts and establishes a benchmark for assessing the quality and diversity of LLM-based text generation in the music industry.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a method for quantifying the diversity of generated marketing texts using language models for improving content generation in the music industry.

data.source: Industrial dataset acquired from a platform connecting musicians and event organizers.
data.annotation: Manual curation and quality control with human ratings for quality and uniqueness.

methodology.calculation: Jaccard similarity score calculated by averaging pairwise similarities of n-grams between generated texts.
methodology.interpretation: Scores closer to 0 indicate higher diversity in generated texts.
methodology.validation: Manual rating by human annotators for comparing generated texts.
